meanings.definition: A decorative border or edging on a garment or piece of fabric.
meanings.sent1: The dress had delicate frillings along the hem.
meanings.sent2: She added frillings to the curtains to make them look prettier.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the frillings on the tablecloth, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the frillings of joy around a happy moment.
meanings.sent5: The frillings on the pillowcases made the bedroom feel cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: Excessive or unnecessary ornamentation or embellishment.
meanings.sent1: The cake was covered in frillings of frosting, making it too sweet.
meanings.sent2: His speech was full of frillings, making it hard to understand the main point.
meanings.sent3: The frillings on the gift wrap were so extravagant that they outshone the gift itself.
meanings.sent4: Her stories were like frillings of fantasy woven into everyday life.
meanings.sent5: The frillings on the car's exterior made it stand out in the parking lot.
